5.name: Winfield M1873C Full Metal Jacket Ammo
5.description: A hardened casing increases this bullet's penetration power, tough additional weight reduces muzzle speed. Better retains damage over distance.

6.name: Winfield M1873C High Velocity Ammo
6.description: A hot-loaded bullet with a strong powder charge combined with a lighter projectile tip significantly boosts the muzzle velocity, but increases recoil slightly. Great for ranged combat.

7.name: Winfield M1873C Incendiary Ammo
7.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.

8.name: Winfield M1873C Full Metal Jacket Ammo
8.description: A hardened casing increases this bullet's penetration power, tough additional weight reduces muzzle speed. Better retains damage over distance.

9.name: Winfield M1873C High Velocity Ammo
9.description: A hot-loaded bullet with a strong powder charge combined with a lighter projectile tip significantly boosts the muzzle velocity, but increases recoil slightly. Great for ranged combat.

10.name: Winfield M1873C Incendiary Ammo
10.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.

11.name: Winfield M1873C Full Metal Jacket Ammo
11.description: A hardened casing increases this bullet's penetration power, tough additional weight reduces muzzle speed. Better retains damage over distance.

12.name: Winfield M1873C High Velocity Ammo
12.description: A hot-loaded bullet with a strong powder charge combined with a lighter projectile tip significantly boosts the muzzle velocity, but increases recoil slightly. Great for ranged combat.

13.name: Winfield M1873C Incendiary Ammo
13.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.

14.name: Sparks LRR Poison Ammo
14.description: This bullet shatters on impact, releasing a toxic agent fatal in high doses. But the cost is reduced stopping power and penetration.

15.name: Sparks LRR Incendiary Ammo
15.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible tracer can give the shooter's position away.
15.unlock_requirement: Earn 750 XP with ans Sparks LRR variant

16.name: Sparks LRR Full Metal Jacket Ammo
16.description: A hardened casing increases this bullet's penetration power, though additional weight reduces muzzle speed. Better retains damage over distance.

17.name: Caldwell Rival 78 Flechette
17.description: This shell contains a number of smaller dart-like projectiles which fan out in a tight spread. Cannot pierce most surfaces, but can saturate an area and cause bleeding damage.

18.name: Caldwell Rival 78 Penny Shot Ammo
18.description: Coins replace shot pellets in this shell for a more powerful, if erratic, barrage. Shreds skin and flesh, but cannot penetrate harder obstacles. Unreliable at a distance.

19.name: Caldwell Rival 78 Slug
19.description: Single solid projectile that can be used in shotguns to provide an advantage in range and penetration over buckshot. Not effective at long distances.

20.name: Lebel 1886 Incendiary Ammo
20.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.

21.name: Lebel 1886 Spitzer Ammo
21.description: Spitzer rounds revolutionize rifle ballistics, improving both penetration and muzzle velocity, through adding slightly stronger recoil. They are more stable in flight and can punch clean through multiple targets, but often cause less severe wounds.

22.name: Lebel 1886 Incendiary Ammo
22.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.

23.name: Lebel 1886 Spitzer Ammo
23.description: Spitzer rounds revolutionize rifle ballistics, improving both penetration and muzzle velocity, through adding slightly stronger recoil. They are more stable in flight and can punch clean through multiple targets, but often cause less severe wounds.

24.name: Bomb Lance Bolt
24.info:
Very Strong Damage
No Penetration
Sticks To Target
Explosive Blast
Chance to Ignite Objects

25.name: Hunting Bow Concertina Arrows
25.description: An arrow with a small Concertina Bomb attached to the point that explodes on impact.
25.unlock_requirement: Earn 750 XP with any Hunting Bow variant

26.name: Hunting Bow Poison Arrows
26.description: A poison-coated arrow that can be retrieved and reused.

27.name: Hunting Bow Frag Arrows
27.description: An arrow with a small Frag Bomb attached to the point that will bouce on impact and detonate after a short time.

28.name: Arrows
28.info:
Very Strong Damage
No Penetration
Cause Bleeding on Hunters
Sticks to Target
Replenishes From Special Ammo Boxes

29.name: Hand Crossbow Choke Bolt
29.description: A Choke Bomb in the form of a compact crossbow bolt. Shorter lifespan and smaller range. Can be used offensively or defensively.

30.name: Hand Crossbow Chaos Bolt
30.description: A compact bolt that emulates the sound of a gunfight just like a Chaos Bomb, but with a shorter effect.

31.name: Hand Crossbow Poison Bolt
31.description: This compact bolt releases a highly toxic agent upon impact. Can cause death in seconds in high doses.

32.name: Bolt
32.info:
Strong Damage
No Penetration
Sticks to Target
Rending
Weak Against Armor
Cause Medium Bleeding on Hunters
MultipleHitsIncrease Intensity
Silenced
Reduced Noise
Supports Stealth Tactics

33.name: Berthier Mle 1892 Incendiary Ammo
33.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.

34.name: Berthier Mle 1892 Spitzer Ammo
34.description: Spitzer rounds revolutionize rifle ballistics, improving both penetration and muzzle velocity, though adding slightly stronger recoil. They are more stable in flight and can punch clean through multiple targets, but often cause less severe wounds.

35.name: Martini-Henry IC1 Explosive Ammo
35.description: This bullet contains a small charge that bursts on impact, scattering shrapnel over an area--the larger the bullet size, the greater the area. Reduced penetration, velocity, and damage, but a well-aimed shot can tear apart Grunts, Hives, and Hellhounds.

36.name: Martini-Henry IC1 Full Metal Jacket Ammo
36.description: A hardened casing increases this bullet's penetration power, though additional weight reduces muzzle speed. Better retains damage over distance.

37.name: Martini-Henry IC1 Incendiary Ammo
37.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.
37.unlock_requirement: Earn 250 XP with any Martini-Henry IC1 variant

38.name: Mosin-Nagant M1891 Spitzer Ammo
38.description: Spitzer rounds revolutionize rifle ballistics, improving both penetration and muzzle velocity, though adding slightly stronger recoil. They are more stable in flight and can punch clean through multiple targets, but often cause less severe wounds.

39.name: Mosin-Nagant M1891 Incendiary Ammo
39.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.

40.name: Mosin-Nagant M1891 Spitzer Ammo
40.description: Spitzer rounds revolutionize rifle ballistics, improving both penetration and muzzle velocity, though adding slightly stronger recoil. They are more stable in flight and can punch clean through multiple targets, but often cause less severe wounds.

41.name: Mosin-Nagant M1891 Incendiary Ammo
41.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.

42.name: Romero 77 Dragon Breath
42.description: This shell creates a several-meter-long jet of flame that ignites anything in its path. Reduced range over buckshot.

43.name: Romero 77 Penny Shot Ammo
43.description: Coins replace shot pellets in this shell for a more powerful, if erratic, barrage. Shreds skin and flesh, but cannot penetrate harder obstacles. Unreliable at a distance.

44.name: Romero 77 Slug
44.description: Single solid projectile that can be used in shotguns to provide an advantage in range and penetration over buckshot. Not effective at long distances.

45.name: Romero 77 Starshell
45.description: A shell that launches a flare that descends slowly, illuminating the area. Ignites everything it touches.
45.unlock_requirement: Earn 250 XP with any Romero 77 variant

46.name: Springfield 1866 Dumdum Ammo
46.description: These modified bullets expands and shatter on impact, causing severe bleeding, but at the expense of penetration power and muzzle velocity. However, this additional stopping power has little effect on monsters and infected.

47.name: Springfield 1866 Explosive Ammo
47.description: This bullet contains a small charge that bursts on impact, scattering shrapnel over an area--the larger the bullet size, the greater the area. Reduced penetration, velocity, and damage, but a well-aimed shot can tear apart Grunts, Hives, and Hellhounds.

52.name: Vetterli 71 Karabiner Incendiary Ammo
52.description: This bullet contains a small phosphorous charge that ignites when fired and sets flammable targets alight. A visible traver can give the shooter's position away.

53.name: Vetterli 71 Karabiner High Velocity Ammo
53.description: A hot-loaded bullet with a strong powder charge combined with a lighter projectile tip significantly boosts the muzzle velocity but increases recoil slightly. Great for ranged combat. When used on weapons with a silencer, the gunfire will be audible at slightly longer distances.
